mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM BX_QA c WHERE c.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND c.STATUS=0 ORDER BY c.QA_ORDER

SELECT c.ID,c.ASK,c.ANSWER,c.MEMBER_ID,c.STATUS,DATE_FORMAT(c.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') CREATE_DATE,c.CREATER_ID,c.QA_ORDER FROM BX_QA c WHERE c.MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND c.STATUS=0 ORDER BY c.QA_ORDER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BX_QA ( ASK, ANSWER, MEMBER_ID, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATER_ID, QA_ORDER ) VALUES ( #{ask} , #{answer}, #{memberId} , 0 , now() , #{createrId} , #{qaOrder} )
